column4: So, i just upgraded to jaunty, and now my firefox cannot go back or forward, and it will not save my history. I've tried removing with from the command line with the --purge swtich, and manually uninstalling through the synaptic gui. No matter what i do, the problem re appears when i intall again. what gives?
i googled and tried all solutions, still no joy.

Did you have a question or problem concerning ubuntu?
Sounds like you have permissions problem. Have you ever ran firefox as root or with sudo? You shouldn't, btw
What does 'ls -l ~/.mozilla' show?
Reinstalling wont help anything
Yech, dist-upgrades
What does 'ls -l ~/.mozilla' show?
ed@oldtimer:~$ ls -l ~/.mozilla
Well it's not a permissions problem it seems. Do have enough disk space available? (df -h)
